title: I Hide
description: I Hide tells the amusing story of a young girl who hides in many different places to avoid going to bed. Detailed illustrations and a repetitive text structure support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify characters and setting as well as connect to prior knowledge to better understand the story.
reviewWords: behind, covers, hide, inside, sleepy, time

awareness: Initial and Final Consonants : Discriminate initial and final consonant s sound
